comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Richmond Pearson Hobson (1870-1937), rear admiral, US Navy; Congressman from Alabama (1907-1915). Wife was Grizelda Hull Hobson (1878-1966). Both are buried at Arlington National Cemetery: www.arlingtoncemetery.net/rphobson.htm

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: pennylrichardsca:  Thank you for the further identification on these two.  When we update the record, we will expand the descriptive information.
